New Records: Ja Morant scored 22 points, 10 assists, and five rebounds in his return; Santi Aldama scored 27 points; Desmond Bane scored 24 points; Lauri Markkanen scored 35 points and nine rebounds
Key Match Events: The Grizzlies won 126-124 despite a late tie by the Jazz; the Jazz erased a double-digit deficit in the fourth quarter; the Grizzlies had 17 three-pointers; the Jazz committed 16 turnovers leading to 22 points for Memphis
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a season-opening win for the Grizzlies; Jay Huff scored in double digits for the first time in two seasons
